Ministry Of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
Ministry Of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises
Ministry of Fisheries,Animal Husbandry and Dairying

Ministry of Women and Child Development
Ministry Of Skill Development And Entrepreneurship
Ministry Of Personnel, Public Grievances And Pensions
Ministry Of Petroleum and Natural Gas
Comptroller And Auditor General Of India
Ministry Of Environment,forests and climate change
Ministry Of Consumer Affairs, Food And Public Distribution
Ministry Of Development Of North Eastern Region
Ministry Of Statistics and Programme Implementation
NITI Aayog (National Institution for Transforming India)

fields.schemeName: Mobility Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The Mobility Scheme is aimed to provide an opportunity to women scientists who are facing difficulties in their present job due to relocation (marriage, transfer of husband to any other location within the country, attending ailing parents, and accompanying children studying in different city).

fields.schemeName: Pre Matric Scholarship For Scheduled Tribe Students
fields.briefDescription: A scholarship scheme by Ministry of Tribal Affairs for regular, full time students from Scheduled Tribe studying in Class 9th and 10th, in a Government School or in a School recognized by Govt. or a Central/State Board of Secondary Education.

fields.schemeName: Pradhan Mantri Garib Kalyan Anna Yojana
fields.briefDescription: The scheme provides free food grain through the Public Distribution System, to all the priority households (ration card holders and those identified by the Antyodaya Anna Yojana scheme) - Migrants and the Poor.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
fields.schemeName: ICAR National Professor And National Fellow
fields.briefDescription: To promote excellence by recognizing outstanding scientists with proven output and outcomes for creating a culture of basic research through their project work in the National Agricultural Research System (NARS).

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
fields.schemeName: Krishi Unnati Yojana - MOVCDNER
fields.briefDescription: Realizing the potential of organic farming in the North Eastern Region of the country Ministry of Agriculture and Farmer Welfare has launched a Central Sector Scheme entitled “Mission Organic Value Chain Development for North Eastern Region” (MOVCDNER) .

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
fields.schemeName: Students Ready
fields.briefDescription: The Student Rural Entrepreneurship Awareness Development Yojana (READY)  was launched by Hon'ble Prime Minister on 25 July 2015.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
fields.schemeName: Credit Based Schemes For SC - Aajeevika Micro-Finance Yojana (Livelihood Microfinance Scheme)
fields.briefDescription: Microfinance scheme by Ministry of Social justice and Empowerment for Entrepreneur of Scheduled Caste Category.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
fields.schemeName: Agri-Clinics And Agri-Business Centres Scheme
fields.briefDescription: A welfare scheme by the Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers' Welfare was launched in 2002. AC&ABC aims at agricultural development, supplementing the efforts of public extension by providing extension and other services to farmers either on a payment basis or free of cost as per the business model.

fields.schemeName: Prime Minister’s Special Scholarship Scheme For The Students Of Union Territories Of Jammu & Kashmir And Ladakh
fields.briefDescription: PMSSS is a scholarship scheme by AICTE for the students who are domicile of the UTs of J&K and Ladakh who, after passing Class 12th or equivalent examination, secure admission in government colleges/institutions and other select institutions outside the UTs of J&K and Ladakh.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
fields.schemeName: Netaji Subhas - ICAR International Fellowship
fields.briefDescription: Introduced in 2009-10, the “Netaji Subhas - ICAR International Fellowship” is a scheme by to develop competent human resource that are trained in the identified best laboratories in the world (for Indian candidates) and similarly expose overseas candidates to the best Agriculture Universities.

fields.schemeName: Scheme to Provide Assistance to Sate Market Committees as well as Taluka-District Co-operative Purchase and Sale Union to Construct Large Size Warehouse Godowns
fields.briefDescription: This scheme has been introduced by the Agriculture, Farmers Welfare and Cooperation Department, Gujarat. It aims to provide financial assistance to State Market Committees and Taluka-District Co-operative Purchase and Sale Unions for constructing large-sized warehouse godowns

fields.schemeName: State Government Share Capital Contribution to Co.operative Sugar Factories (Normal Area) (Tribal Area)
fields.briefDescription: This scheme has been introduced by the Agriculture, Farmers Welfare and Cooperation Department, Gujarat. It aims to provide financial assistance in the form of a 30% share capital contribution by the State Government for setting up new sugar cooperative factories in Gujarat.

fields.schemeName: West Bengal Transport Workers’ Social Security Scheme: Maternity Benefit
fields.briefDescription: This scheme provides financial assistance to a beneficiary on successful delivery of a child or miscarriage by such beneficiary or his wife.

fields.schemeName: Grant Scheme for Marriage of SC and ST Girls
fields.briefDescription: “Grant Scheme for Marriage of SC and ST Girls” is a social security scheme by the Social Welfare Department, Government of Uttarakhand, that provides financial assistance to the SC and ST girls to cover the expenses of marriage.

fields.schemeName: Post Matric Scholarship For Minorities
fields.briefDescription: A scholarship scheme by Ministry of Minority Affairs for students from minority communities pursuing a post-matric course from a notified institution in India in a government or private school. A total of five (5) lakh scholarships are targeted to be distributed as ‘Fresh’ Scholarships.

beneficiaryState: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
fields.schemeName: Investment Promotion Scheme (IPS) for MSME Sector: Assistance For Patent Registration /Trade Mark Registration
fields.briefDescription: “Assistance For Patent Registration/ Trade Mark Registration” under the “Investment Promotion Scheme (IPS)” for MSME sector, implemented by the Dept. of Industries, U.T. Administration Of DNH & DD, aims to extend support for obtaining Patent Registration/ Trade Mark Registration.

beneficiaryState: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
fields.schemeName: Investment Promotion Scheme (IPS) for Thrust Sectors: Assistance For Marble, IT & ITES, Electric Vehicles & Spare Parts, Toys Units And Semi-Conduct or Industries Sectors
fields.briefDescription: “Assistance For Marble, IT & ITES, Electric Vehicles & Spare Parts, Toys Units And Semi-Conduct or Industries Sectors'' under the “Investment Promotion Scheme (IPS)” for Thrust Sectors, by the Dept. of Industries,  DNH & DD, aims to promote industries through providing various types of subsidy.

beneficiaryState: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
fields.schemeName: Investment Promotion Scheme (IPS) For Handicraft Artisans: Assistance For Capital Investment To Uplift The Economic Condition Of Artisans/ Persons
fields.briefDescription: This is a sub-scheme under the “Investment Promotion Scheme (IPS)”, implemented by the Dept. of Industries, U.T. Administration Of DNH & DD, that aims to provide additional tools/equipment to SC/ST/OBC/EWS communities to generate adequate income and self-employment.

beneficiaryState: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
fields.schemeName: Investment Promotion Scheme (IPS) for Thrust Sectors: Scheme For Vaccine Manufacturing Units
fields.briefDescription: “ Scheme For Vaccine Manufacturing Units'' under the “Investment Promotion Scheme (IPS)” for Thrust Sectors, implemented by the Dept. of Industries, U.T. Administration Of DNH & DD, aims to provide Interest Subsidy to Vaccine Manufacturing Units.

beneficiaryState: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
fields.schemeName: Investment Promotion Scheme (IPS): Scheme For Reimbursement Of Stamp Duty
fields.briefDescription: “Scheme For Reimbursement Of Stamp Duty'' under the “Investment Promotion Scheme (IPS)”, implemented by the Dept. of Industries, U.T. Administration Of DNH & DD, aims to provide reimbursement on Stamp duty to the new units as well as the units undertaking expansion/ diversification.

beneficiaryState: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
fields.schemeName: Pension Scheme to Disabled Persons (Divyangjan)
fields.briefDescription: The scheme is implemented by the Social Welfare Department to provide financial assistance to individuals with disabilities. The primary objective is to provide financial benefits to eligible Divyangjan to cater to their basic needs. The scheme is targeted at Divyangjan aged between 18 to 59 years.

beneficiaryState: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
fields.schemeName: Ex-gratia for Permanent Disability/ Chronic Diseases/ Surgery/ Operation for the Construction Workers
fields.briefDescription: "Ex-gratia for Permanent Disability/ Chronic Diseases/ Surgery/ Operation for the Construction Workers'' by the BOCW Welfare Board, Labour Dept.,  U.T. of DNH & DD, is a welfare scheme that provides financial assistance for Permanent Disability/ Chronic Diseases/ Surgery/ Operation of the workers.

beneficiaryState: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
fields.schemeName: Grant for the Purchase of Tools/ Protective Gear for the Construction Workers
fields.briefDescription: The "Grant for the Purchase of Tools/ Protective Gear for the Construction Workers'' by the BOCW Welfare Board, Labour Department,  U.T. Administration of DNH & DD, is a welfare scheme that provides financial assistance to the eligible registered member for purchase of tools.

beneficiaryState: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
fields.schemeName: Promoting Registration for the Construction Workers
fields.briefDescription: The "Promoting Registration for the Construction Workers'' by the BOCW Welfare Board, Labour Department, U.T. of DNH & DD, is a welfare scheme that provides sleeping mat/ blanket/ mosquito net to registered construction workers, in order to encourage construction workers to register with the Board.

beneficiaryState: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
fields.schemeName: Pension for the Construction Workers
fields.briefDescription: The "Pension for the Construction Workers'' by the BOCW Welfare Board, Labour Department,  U.T. Administration of DNH & DD, is a welfare scheme that provides a monthly pension after completion of 60 years to the eligible registered member.

beneficiaryState: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
fields.schemeName: Saraswati Vidya Yojana: Reimbursement of Fees for Diploma/Graduation and Post-Graduation Professional Courses
fields.briefDescription: “Reimbursement of Fees for Diploma/ Graduation and Post-Graduation Professional Courses'' under “Saraswati Vidya Yojana”, implemented by the Directorate of Education,  Of DNH & DD, aims to provide financial assistance to girl students pursuing higher education in professional courses.

fields.schemeName: Agricultural Skill Development Training Programme For Women Farmers And Farmers
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Agricultural Skill Development Training Programme for Women Farmers and Farmers” was started by the Department of Agriculture, Farmers Welfare & Co-operation, Government of Gujarat.

fields.schemeName: Gaon Ki Beti
fields.briefDescription: MP Gaon Ki Beti Yojna 2022-23 is a scholarship provided by the Madhya Pradesh government. The MP state government has started this scheme to encourage the higher education of girl children in remote areas in 2005.

fields.schemeName: Scheme to Provide Financial Assistance to Purchase Solar Power Unit/Kit for Solar Fencing around the Farm
fields.briefDescription: This scheme has been introduced by the Agriculture, Farmers Welfare and Cooperation Department, Gujarat. It aims to provide financial assistance to farmers for purchasing solar power units/kits for solar fencing around their farms to protect crops from damage caused by wild and stray animals.

fields.schemeName: Scheme to Provide Financial Assistance to Farmers for Purchasing Sanedo Agricultural Equipment
fields.briefDescription: This scheme has been introduced by the Agriculture, Farmers Welfare and Cooperation Department, Gujarat. It aims to provide financial assistance to farmers for purchasing Sanedo (Mini Tractor) equipment, which enhances efficiency and reduces labor dependency in farming operations.

fields.schemeName: Scheme for Assistance on Purchase of Smartphone by the Farmers
fields.briefDescription: This scheme has been introduced by the Agriculture, Farmers Welfare and Cooperation Dept., Gujarat. It aims to provide financial assistance to farmers for purchasing smartphones, enabling them to access agricultural technology, weather updates, pest control techniques, and government assistance.

fields.schemeName: Farmers Accidental Insurance Scheme
fields.briefDescription: This scheme has been introduced by the Agriculture, Farmers Welfare and Cooperation Dept., Gujarat. It aims to provide financial assistance to the families of registered farmers in the event of accidental death or disability.

fields.schemeName: Incentive Assistance to Scheduled Tribe Farmers to Increase the Area, Production and Productivity of Sugarcane Farming
fields.briefDescription: This scheme has been introduced by the Agriculture, Farmers Welfare and Cooperation Department, Gujarat. It aims to provide financial assistance to ST farmers to increase sugarcane production and productivity through quality seeds, modern farming practices, and agricultural mechanization.

fields.schemeName: Financial Assistance For Marriage (APB&OCWWB)
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Financial Assistance for Marriage” was started by the Department of Labour and Employment, Govt. of Arunachal Pradesh for the registered workers of Arunachal Pradesh Building & Other Construction Workers Welfare Board (APB&OCWWB).

fields.schemeName: Economic Help To Tribal Girls For Higher Education (Class 11 & 12)
fields.briefDescription: Rajasthan Government started a scholarship for tribal girls higher education (Class 11 & 12) In the year 2011.

fields.schemeName: Marriage Assistance
fields.briefDescription: The Government of Tamil Nadu introduced "Marriage Assistance"  for the employees or their Son/Daughter who legally attain the age of marriage.

fields.schemeName: Kishore Vaigyanik Protsahan Yojana
fields.briefDescription: The KVPY is a national fellowship program in basic sciences, initiated and funded by the Department of Science and Technology to attract exceptionally motivated students to pursue basic science courses and a research career in science.

fields.schemeName: Financial Assistance for the Treatment of Blind, Disabled, Deaf, Dumb, or Mentally Challenged Ex-Servicemen and their Dependents (Wife and Children)
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to provide monthly financial assistance for the treatment of ex-servicemen and their dependents (wife & children) who have a disability of 40% or more and are suffering from serious illnesses such as cancer, leprosy, tuberculosis, kidney and cardiac ailments, paralysis, etc.

fields.schemeName: Devnarayan Pratibhawan Chhatra Protsahan Yojana
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to encourage academic excellence among students belonging to Special Backward Classes (SBC). It provides an annual financial incentive of ₹3,500/- to students pursuing education from Class 10th to postgraduate level in government schools or colleges.

fields.schemeName: Establishment of 50 Milch Animals Dairy Unit
fields.briefDescription: The "Establishment of 50 Milch Animals Dairy Unit" scheme introduced by the Agriculture, Farmers Welfare and Cooperation Department, Gujarat, aims to provide financial aid to livestock owners for setting up dairy farms, ensuring sustainable dairy production.

fields.schemeName: Shagun Yojana
fields.briefDescription: The "Shagun Yojana" aims to assist BPL families with financial aid for the marriage of their daughters. A grant of ₹31,000 is provided to the girl/women.

fields.schemeName: Reimbursement of Tution Fee for SC/ST/OBC/Min students in Public Schools in Class I to XII
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to provide financial support by reimbursing tuition and compulsory fees for SC/ST/OBC students from low-income families (below ₹3,00,000/- per annum) studying in recognized schools in Delhi. Beneficiaries must meet academic and attendance criteria.

fields.schemeName: BC & EBC Girls Residential +2 High School
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to provide quality education and holistic development opportunities for girls from backward and extremely backward classes. Free education, accommodation, study material, medical support, and skill development programs are provided.

fields.schemeName: Scholarships For Higher Education Abroad To Meritorious Boys And Girls From Open Category
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Scholarships for Higher Education Abroad to Meritorious Boys and Girls from open category” was launched by the Department of Higher and Technical Education, Government of Maharashtra on 4th October 2018.

fields.schemeName: The Goa State Photo Contest And Exhibition Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to encourage local youths in photography and photojournalism, providing cash prizes and exhibition opportunities. The scheme offers cash prizes of ₹20,000/-, ₹16,000/-, and ₹12,000/- in each category. Entries from applicants born and residing in Goa are preferred.

fields.schemeName: Valmiki Chhatravritti Yojana
fields.briefDescription: The "Valmiki Chhatravritti Yojana" by the Department of Higher and Technical Education, Government of Jharkhand, aims to provide financial assistance and encouragement to orphaned and differently-abled students to pursue higher education and benefits include full tuition fee reimbursement.

fields.schemeName: The Goa State Journalist Awards Scheme
fields.briefDescription: "The Goa State Journalist Awards Scheme" aims to encourage journalists to publish commendable news items, articles, or reports, fostering mass awareness. It provides awards, including a cash prize of ₹10,000/-, to eligible journalists in Goa.

fields.schemeName: Scholarship/Merit scholarship to OBC/MIN/SC/ST students from Class I to XII
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to provide financial assistance to students from SC/ST/OBC/Minority communities studying in classes I to XII in government or recognised schools in Delhi. The scheme offers varying scholarship amounts based on class and academic performance, ensuring support for education.

fields.schemeName: Subsidy for School Uniforms to the Students
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to provide cash subsidies for school uniforms to students from Nursery to Class XII in government and aided schools. Benefits include annual payments ranging from ₹1,100/- to ₹1,500/-, ensuring financial support for all eligible students.

fields.schemeName: Assistance for Power Driven Chaff Cutter scheme
fields.briefDescription: The "Assistance for Power Driven Chaff Cutter Scheme" introduced by the Agriculture, Farmers Welfare and Cooperation Department, Gujarat, is designed to help farmers reduce fodder wastage and improve their dairy farming efficiency.

fields.schemeName: Establishment of Goat Unit (10 +1)
fields.briefDescription: The "Establishment of Goat Unit (10+1)" scheme by the Agriculture, Farmers Welfare and Cooperation Department, Gujarat, aims to promote the social and economic upliftment of goat breeders by encouraging goat breeding and genetic improvement through pure breeding.

fields.schemeName: Maternity Benefit Scheme (APB&OCWWB)
fields.briefDescription: The Govt. of Arunachal Pradesh has proposed and implemented the scheme “Maternity Benefit Scheme” for Registered Workers of Arunachal Pradesh Building & Other Construction Workers Welfare Board (APB&OCWWB).

fields.schemeName: Construction of Dudhghar/ Godown (Scheduled Caste Area)
fields.briefDescription: The scheme "Construction of Dudhghar/ Godown (Scheduled Caste Area)" provides financial assistance for the construction of Dudhghar (milk storage unit) and Godown (cattle feed storage) for Village Milk Producer Co-operative Societies in Scheduled Caste areas of Gujarat.

fields.schemeName: Construction of Dudhghar/ Godown (Scheduled Tribe Area)
fields.briefDescription: The scheme "Construction of Dudhghar/ Godown (Scheduled Tribe Area)" provides financial assistance for the construction of Dudhghar (milk storage unit) and Godown (cattle feed storage) for Village Milk Producer Co-operative Societies in Scheduled Tribe areas of Gujarat.

fields.schemeName: Skilled Youth Startup Scheme
fields.briefDescription: Sikkim Skilled Youth Startup Scheme was launched in 2020 and is implemented by the Department of Commerce & Industries which aims at assisting the educated unemployed youth in setting up a myriad of enterprises through loans with back-ended financial subsidy assistance.

fields.schemeName: Ganga Kalyana Scheme
fields.briefDescription:
Ganga Kalyana Scheme is implemented by Karnataka Minorities Development Corporation Limited.
This scheme is a fully subsidized scheme, bore wells, pumps and electrification are provided to minorities, and small and marginal farmers living in rural areas.

fields.schemeName: Integrated Social Security Scheme - Women In Distress
fields.briefDescription: ISSS (Integrated Social Security Scheme) is a State Sponsored Scheme by the Social Welfare Department of the Govt. of Jammu and Kashmir where financial assistance is provided to Old Age Persons, Widows, Divorcees, Women in Distress, Transgenders, and Physically Handicapped Persons.

fields.schemeName: Dr. Ambedkar Medical Aid Scheme (Revised – 2009)
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Dr. Ambedkar Medical Aid Scheme” has been revised and implemented by the Directorate of Welfare of Scheduled Caste & Backward Classes, Government of Haryana in 2009. Under this scheme, the state government provides medical treatment facilities to patients of the SC/ST communities.

fields.schemeName: Deen Dayal SPARSH Yojana (Scholarship For Promotion Of Aptitude & Research In Stamps As A Hobby)
fields.briefDescription: "Deen Dayal SPARSH Yojana" awards annual scholarships to students who have good academic records and are also pursuing 'Philately' as a hobby. The objective is to “Promote Philately among children at a young age in a sustainable manner that can reinforce and supplement the academic curriculum.

fields.schemeName: Dr. B. R. Ambedkar State Award To SC/ST/OBC/Minorities Students
fields.briefDescription: This scholarship aims to award the eligible meritorious students.

fields.schemeName: Ashraya Adhar Scheme
fields.briefDescription: "Ashraya Adhar Scheme" is introduced to provide financial assistance in the form of loans to the members of Scheduled Tribes for the purpose of repair, renovation/reconstruction of houses. The Goa State Scheduled Tribes Finance and Development Corporation has introduced this scheme.

fields.schemeName: Samagr Samajik Suraksha Pension Yojana
fields.briefDescription: Madhya Pradesh State Government started the "Samagr Samajik Suraksha Pension Yojana" for different age groups.

fields.schemeName: Reimbursement of Expenses for Startups Operating from Leased/Privately Owned Premises Scheme
fields.briefDescription: “Reimbursement of Expenses for Startups Operating from Leased/Privately Owned Premises Scheme” is a scheme for the Startups of Goa. The cost towards internet connectivity, software license fees and cloud services fees, will be reimbursed.

fields.schemeName: Chief Minister's Adarsh Gram Yoiana 2017
fields.briefDescription: The Government of Arunachal Pradesh has decided to implement the Chief Minister's Adarsh Gram Yojana 2017 for creating model villages in the state.

fields.schemeName: Chief Ministergi Shotharabasingi Tengbang (CMST): Scholarship Of Students With Disabilities
fields.briefDescription: "CMST: Scholarship of Students with Disabilities" is a Scholarship Scheme by the Govt. of Manipur. In this scheme, the Students with Disability who are a domicile of the State of Manipur, and are studying in Class 1st and and above are awarded with scholarship of upto ₹ 8,000/-.

fields.schemeName: Chief Minister’s Agriculture Mechanisation Programme
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Chief Minister’s Agriculture Mechanisation Programme” was started by the government of Arunachal Pradesh to promote mechanization & hiring services for various agriculture Machinery/ Implements of post-harvest technology (PHY) equipment applied for different operations.

fields.schemeName: Vayomadhuram Scheme For Providing Glucometer To Senior Citizens
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Vayomadhuram Scheme for Providing Glucometer to Senior Citizens” was launched by the Department of Social Justice, Government of Kerala.

fields.schemeName: Chief Minister Specially Abled Samman Pension Scheme
fields.briefDescription: Rajasthan Government started a scholarship for Specially Abled persons.

fields.schemeName: Snehasparsham
fields.briefDescription: The Government of Kerala has launched the “Snehasparsham” scheme to protect and help unwed mothers. The problems of unwed mothers are linked with various socio-economic and cultural variables.

fields.schemeName: Vocational Training in Tribal Areas
fields.briefDescription: The scheme will be implemented for the benefit of the Scheduled Tribes as well as PTGs and can be taken up anywhere in the country but priority will be given to remote tribal areas, areas inhabited by particularly vulnerable tribes, and areas affected by extremist activities.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
fields.schemeName: Centrally Sponsored Scheme of Pre-matric Scholarship to Other Backward Classes (OBC) for Studies in India
fields.briefDescription: "Centrally Sponsored Scheme of Pre-matric Scholarship to Other Backward Classes for Studies in India" is a Scholarship Scheme by the Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment. The objective is to award scholarships to school-going children of poorer OBC parents.

fields.schemeName: Scholarship Scheme For Disabled Students To Study Abroad For Higher Education
fields.briefDescription: In 2008, Madhya Pradesh State Government started the "Nihshakt Vidyarthiyon Ko Uchch Shiksha Hetu Videsh Adhyayan Hetu Chhaatravrtti Yojana" for disabled students to study abroad for higher education.

fields.schemeName: Bank Tie-Up Scheme
fields.briefDescription: Through the "Bank Tie-Up Scheme", the Punjab Scheduled Castes Land Development & Finance Corporation (PSCLDFC) arranges loans through banks, and subsidy is provided by PSCLDFC. The permanent residents of Punjab belonging to Scheduled Castes and living Below Poverty Line are eligible.

fields.schemeName: GITANJALI HOUSING SCHEME
fields.briefDescription: The West Bengal State Government runs Gitanjali Housing Scheme. Under this Scheme, the West Bengal State Government will provide all assistance to construct houses for the homeless. The predecessor of the Gitanjali Housing Scheme is the ‘Amar Thikana Scheme’.
tags: West Bengal Housing Infrastructure Development Corporation
Affordable Homes Under GITANJALI HOUSING SCHEME

fields.schemeName: Indirect Tax Internship Scheme In Central Board Of Indirect Taxes And Customs (CBIC)
fields.briefDescription: The "Indirect Tax Internship Scheme" by CBIC takes Law Students/ Graduates as Interns every year. The interns are expected to study case files, assist in legal research and drafting of petitions, brief the counsels and extend any other related legal/general assistance to officers/counsels.

fields.schemeName: National Science Chair- Scientific Excellence
fields.briefDescription: The main aim of the scheme is to recognize active eminent senior resident Indian superannuated scientists for their outstanding contributions both nationally and internationally, in the areas of Science, Technology, Engineering, Mathematics (STEM) & Medicine, to promote excellence and growth in R&D.

fields.schemeName: Unemployment Assistance Scheme - Tamil Nadu
fields.briefDescription: In 2006, Tamil Nadu Government started Unemployment Assistance Scheme for the welfare of unemployed youth of  the state.

fields.schemeName: Kailash Mansarovar Yatra Scheme 2016
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Kailash Mansarovar Yatra Scheme 2016” was launched by the Tourism Department, Government of Haryana on 12th July 2016. Under the scheme, the government of Haryana provides financial assistance to the pilgrims of the State of Haryana.

fields.schemeName: National Handicrafts Development Programme: Infrastructure And Technology Support: EMPORIA
fields.briefDescription: In the scheme "Infrastructure and Technology Support: EMPORIA" assistance would be provided for the setting up of emporia. These would be set up in commercially viable locations in the implementing agencies' own/rented buildings.

fields.schemeName: Journalist's Medical Welfare Scheme - Assam
fields.briefDescription: The Journalist's Medical Welfare Scheme was first implemented in 2012 by the Government of Assam. Under this scheme, one-time financial assistance is provided to the accredited and recognized journalists of Assam for their medical treatment.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
fields.schemeName: Persons With Disabilities Scheme In Colleges: Higher Education For Persons With Special Needs
fields.briefDescription: The Persons with Disabilities Act 1995 indicates that differently-abled persons should have access to education at all levels. In the higher education sector, the University Grants Commission (UGC) is supporting universities and colleges in the country to involve in special education activities.

fields.schemeName: Chief Minister's Overseas Scholarship Scheme for Minorities
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Chief Minister's Overseas Scholarship Scheme for Minorities” was launched by the Minorities Welfare Department, Government of Telangana in the year 2015-16 for students belonging to the Minority community to pursue Higher Studies in Post Graduate Courses in Foreign Universities.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Environment,forests and climate change
fields.schemeName: Internship Programme Of The Wildlife Crime Control Bureau (MoEFCC)
fields.briefDescription: Internship at Wildlife Crime Control Bureau (WCCB) provides an excellent opportunity for students/researchers to familiarize themselves with various issues related to wildlife & the functioning of WCCB. The intern shall have an orientation session and would be assigned specific areas of work.

fields.schemeName: Grant-in-Aid Scheme To Provide Financial Assistance To The Mahila Mandals/ Women’s Self-help Groups (SWAWLAMBHAN)
fields.briefDescription: The SWAWLAMBHAN Scheme by the Govt. of Goa provides financial assistance to Mahila Mandals/Self-Help Groups for training/orientation for members of the Mahila Mandal/Self-Help Groups for generating their own activity for self-employment.

fields.schemeName: Swatantrata Sainik Samman Pension Scheme
fields.briefDescription: Launched on 15th August 1972, "Swatantrata Sainik Samman Pension Scheme" is a Pension Scheme by the Ministry of Home Affairs. The scheme provides the grant of pension to living freedom fighters and their families; if they are no more alive, and to the families or martyrs.

fields.schemeName: Safai Karmakar Ke Bachche Hetu Chhatravrtti Yojana
fields.briefDescription: Chhattisgarh State Government started a scheme "Safai Karmakar Ke Bachche Hetu Chhatravrtti Yojana" for unorganized worker on 11 March 2015.

fields.schemeName: Prabhuddha Overseas Scholarship
fields.briefDescription: The PRABHUDDHA OVERSEAS SCHOLARSHIP scheme selects around 250 undergraduate and 150 postgraduate and PhD students from the SC/ST communities, providing them with financial assistance. The initiative aims to support deserving students in pursuing their academic aspirations.

fields.schemeName: Promotion of Literature on Art & Culture of Local Authors/ Organization
fields.briefDescription: The scheme "Goa State Best Library and Best Librarian Award" has been designed to encourage Goan writers to publish their literature on Art and Culture. The entire expenditure on printing and publishing the book is borne by Govt. by keeping the copyright of the publication.

fields.schemeName: Mahatma Jyothiba Phule Overseas Vidya Nidhi for BC and EBC Students
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Mahatma Jyothiba Phule Overseas Vidya Nidhi” was launched by the Backward Classes Welfare Department, Government of Telangana for meritorious students belonging to Backward Classes & Economically Backward Classes to pursue Higher Studies in foreign universities.

fields.schemeName: Scheme to Provide Grant to the Institutions for Long Term Project in the Field of Art and Culture (Sarjansheel Goa)
fields.briefDescription: "Scheme to Provide Grant to the Institutions for Long Term Project in the Field of Art and Culture (Sarjansheel Goa)" implemented by the by the Directorate of Art and Culture, provides financial support to the institutions/ individuals involved in long-term projects in the field Art & Culture.

fields.schemeName: Griha Aadhar Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The "Griha Aadhar Scheme" addresses the problem of spiralling prices and provides support to the housewives/homemakers from the middle, lower-middle and poor sections of society, to maintain a reasonable standard of living for their families.

fields.schemeName: Overseas Scholarships For Scheduled Tribes-Madhya Pradesh
fields.briefDescription: Madhya Pradesh state started a scheme for scheduled Tribes.

fields.schemeName: Mukhyamantri Nirmaan Majadur suraksha upakaran sahaayata yojana
fields.briefDescription: Chhattisgarh State Government started "Mukhyamantri Nirmaan Majadur Suraksha Upakaran Sahaayata Yojana" for Building and other construction workers.

fields.schemeName: Development Support for Coffee in Traditional Areas: Support to Small Growers' Collectives/ SHGs/ Cooperatives for Coffee Marketing
fields.briefDescription: The objective of the scheme is to extend support to small and tiny growers, incentivizing them to form collectives/ Self Help Groups/ Cooperatives, thus encouraging them to take up marketing of coffee produced on a community-based approach through suitable financial incentives.

fields.schemeName: TEC Internship Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The ‘TEC Internship Scheme’ intends to engage 25 Interns in order to study/formulate/operationalize/assess various works/projects/policies etc. The internship will provide an opportunity for young scholars to contribute to the TEC work and have insight into the related technical work.

fields.schemeName: Border Areas Development Department
fields.briefDescription: The program aims to meet the special development needs of the people living in remote and inaccessible areas situated near the international border and to saturate the border areas with the essential infrastructure and improving the security environment in border areas on the other.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
fields.schemeName: RKVY Soil Health and Fertility - Soil Health Card
fields.briefDescription: Soil Health Card is designed to give each farmer soil nutrient status of his/her holding and advice him/her on the dosage of fertilizers and also the needed soil amendments, that s/he should apply to maintain soil health in the long run.

fields.schemeName: Kerala Biotechnology Re-Entry Fellowship
fields.briefDescription: “Kerala Biotechnology Re-Entry Fellowship (K-BiREF)” is a fellowship programme to attract well-trained and highly skilled researchers with a good track record (Indian nationals) working abroad in various frontier areas in biotechnology to research and academic institutions in Kerala.

fields.schemeName: Computer Training Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The scheme is being operated with the objective to provide better chances of employment to the youth by enhancing their skills.

fields.schemeName: Snehapoorvam Scheme
fields.briefDescription: Kerala Government has launched a noble initiative “Snehapoorvam Scheme” to provide financial assistance to orphans who are living in the family, with their relatives, friends, or the support of the community under the Social Welfare Department implemented through Social Security Mission.
